thread.title: Jedward dad fighting for life: Twins find out father in 'critical condition' after CBB
thread.title_full: Jedward dad fighting for life: Twins find out father in 'critical condition' after CBB

title: Jedward dad fighting for life: Twins find out father in 'critical condition' after CBB
text:
GETTY HUSH HUSH: Their father ordered family not to tell the brothers about his illnes 
And he was worried they might give up on their bid to win the reality show and rush to his bedside in an intensive care unit. 
Proud father John also wanted the twins to carry on “for their fans’ sake”. 
The lads’ mother and manager Susanna Condron said: “The last week has been very stressful for Jedward’s family. 
TWITTER PROUD: He also wanted them to keep going 'for their fans's sake' 
LANDMARK CRITICAL CONDITION: John Grimes Snr has been in intensive care “He insisted Edward and John must not be informed about his critical condition” Susanna Condron, mum and manager 
“John Snr has been in intensive care. He insisted Edward and John must not be informed about his critical condition. 
“He stated he would not jeopardise their chances of reaching the final as ‘there would have been legions of disappointed fans’.” 
The hyper singers have wowed fans on this year’s CBB. Jedward Wednesday, 22nd July 2015 John and Edward Grimes aka Jedward are former X Factor contestants and now star in Sharknado 3: Oh Hell No! 1 / 14 GC Images Jedward seen arriving at the Kiss FM Studios 
Thousands voted for Jedward in last night’s final after they took on the role of peacemakers between Kim Woodburn and Nicola McLean. 
Their Diary Room honesty inspired many fans to back the lads over other finalists, including actor James Cosmo and Loose Women’s Coleen Nolan. 
The lads had been planning to cash in on their renewed fame but insiders said all that is now in the balance while their dad is ill. Related articles
